subject: Horse Racing
Belmont Stakes
Big Brown (Race Horse)
lead_paragraph: A previous generation of racehorses, that of Secretariat, Seattle Slew and Affirmed, worked out harder and raced more that today’s Triple Crown mounts.
snippet: A previous generation of racehorses, that of Secretariat, Seattle Slew and Affirmed, worked out harder and raced more that today’s Triple Crown mounts.
